item.title: Getting a compiler error when trying to make admins not being able to trade!
item.dc:creator: @Brenz Brenz
item.description:
@Brenz wrote:

[quote=“Bubbsy7, post:1, topic:229446”]Ok this is what i add in my case 128: (Trading case)

case 128: //Trade Request if(other.playerRights == 2){ sendMessage("Admins cannot trade."); return; } if(playerRights == 2){ sendMessage("Admins cannot trade."); return; } WanneTradeWith = inStream.readUnsignedWord(); WanneTrade = 1; break;

I get an error with the if (other.playerRights) part…PLEASE HELP![/quote]

Which tut did you follow for this or is it one you came up with ?

Brendan

Read full topic
